rules.text: Follow the instance Code of Conduct: https://en.osm.town/about

records.text: Over the years I have been to a lot of gigs and festivals, and the only record I have of this is #Songkick. However, these days their API is very restrictive as they don't give access for hobbyist or education use. Furthermore, they want to charge existing apps, including Songkick Export2Excel, a hefty $500 per month for API access, which has left me thinking - what alternatives are there? https://www.change.org/p/grant-the-songkick-export2excel-app-access-to-the-songkick-database-again
